txt.en: You are refreshed from your rest, and better able to learn from your experiences.  When you log off for an extended period, you earn a period where you can earn more XP for defeating foes.  Mouseover your XP bar for more details.

Daily as a subscriber you will earn a small section of enhanced XP gain based on your level. This bonus doubles the xp that you gain from defeating enemies and completing quests. This increases character XP, Legendary Item XP, and Mounted combat XP. It is represented by the dark blue area on your XP bar. Mouseover your XP bar for more details.
